alert.note: Alert for Luzerne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 4:44PM EDT until August 12 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 444 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rock Glen, or near Berwick, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hazleton, West Hazleton, Conyngham, Jeddo, Drifton, Rock Glen, Drums, Weston, Ashmore and Deringer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Pennsylvania. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
